subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets erased an early six-run deficit against the Cardinals but Albert Pujols’ run-scoring single off Pedro Feliciano in the 13th sunk the Mets.
snippet: The Mets erased an early six-run deficit against the Cardinals but Albert Pujols’ run-scoring single off Pedro Feliciano in the 13th sunk the Mets.
